name: DOOMSTAR
description:
DOOMSTAR has chased your ship into an asteroid belt, and you unfortunately have no weapons for dealing with asteroids or giant deadly space monsters!

Fortunately for you, DOOMSTAR's armor could be destroyed if hit with enough asteroids. Dodge the oncoming asteroids while leading DOOMSTAR into them to destroy him!

For the GMTK Game Jam 2018.

Music is Wretched Destroyer by Kevin MacLeod.
